body:
# Components

## Application Security Management (WAF)

* :sparkles: Only report ASM_DD, ASM_DATA and ASM capabilities when AppSec is enabled (#9260 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
* :bug: Fix NPE in AppSecConfigServiceImpl (#9165 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
* :bug: Fix AppSec play.mvc.StatusHeader instrumentation for play 2.6 (#9160 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)

## Build & Tooling

* :sparkles::book: Automatically register crashtracking via native extensions (#8851 - @MattAlp)

## Configuration at Runtime

* :sparkles: Create activation origin config for telemetry (#9064 - @sezen-datadog)

## Continuous Integration Visibility

* :sparkles: Update GitLab provided tags (#9275 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :bug: Fix base branch SHA usage in GitHub Actions (#9257 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :sparkles: Add `ci.job.id` tag (#9256 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :sparkles: Add new org to Weaver instrumentation (#9235 - @daniel-mohedano - thanks for the contribution!)
* :sparkles: Improve Git commit info building (#9210 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :sparkles: Update Attempt to Fix to v5 (#9145 - @daniel-mohedano)

## Crash tracking

* :sparkles::book: Automatically register crashtracking via native extensions (#8851 - @MattAlp)

## Data Streams Monitoring

* :sparkles: Reduce DSM CPU overheard (#9151 - @kr-igor)
* :sparkles::zap: DSM optimizations for high throughput scenarios (#9137 - @kr-igor)

## Database Monitoring

* :bug: Fix duplicate trace injection for SQL Server and Oracle DBM full propagation mode (#9224 - @lu-zhengda)

## Dynamic Instrumentation

* :bug: Add URI in string primitives (#9285 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: Increase SourceFile tracking max queue size (#9271 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: Add capping on SourceFile tracking queue (#9245 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: Add third-party filtering in SourceFile tracking (#9205 - @jpbempel)

## ML Observability (LLMObs)

* :sparkles: Add methods to capture embedding and retrieval spans (#9297 - @nayeem-kamal)

## Metrics

* :sparkles: Change primary client stats configuration key (#9196 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Calculate client stats also if the span kind is eligible (#9157 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Backpropagate peer tags (#9144 - @bric3)
* :bug: Make client stats reliable in case of downgrade (#9136 - @amarziali)

## Platform components

* :bug: Fix VM options parsing from /proc/fs (#9255 - @PerfectSlayer)

## Profiling

* :sparkles: Switch profile compression to zstd default (#9293 - @jbachorik)
* :sparkles: Bump ddprof to 1.29.0 (#9262 - @zhengyu123)
   * Potential memory leak and race with the JVMTI wallclock sampler by @zhengyu123 in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/234
   * Downport async-profiler no-allocation changes by @zhengyu123 in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/245
   * Adopt openjdk safefetch by @zhengyu123 in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/246
   * Safe fetch 64-bit value and pointer by @zhengyu123 in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/247
   * Rebase on Async-Profiler 4.1 by @jbachorik in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/252
   * Patch upstream stackWalker.cpp not to fail on unaligned access by @jbachorik in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/218
   * Remap thread id to avoid bitmap contention by @zhengyu123 in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/229
   * Improve performance using Unsafe to activate/deactivate thread filter by @zhengyu123 in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/230
   * Unify context propagation by @zhengyu123 in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/231
   
* :bug: Fix the profiler stackdepth setting propagation in recent (22+) Java versions (#9130 - @jbachorik)

## Realtime User Monitoring

* :sparkles: Wrap servlet original PrintWriter on rum injector (#9146 - @amarziali)

## Telemetry

* :sparkles: Create activation origin config for telemetry (#9064 - @sezen-datadog)

## Tracer core

* :sparkles::zap: Reduce span construction overhead by switching to optimized TagMap (#8589 - @dougqh)
* :bug: Match Hands Off Config selectors on process_arguments value (#9201 - @paullegranddc)
* :sparkles: Move JSON generation to sender thread to improve startup time. (#9197 - @AlexeyKuznetsov-DD)
* :sparkles: Improve agent to avoid loading global config on main thread (#9190 - @PerfectSlayer)
* :sparkles: add injection metadata fields to telemetry forwarder (#9185 - @sydney-tung)
* :bug: Avoid race conditions on feature discovery during Writer creation (#9173 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :sparkles: Surface potential root cause when agent initialization errors (#9170 - @AlexeyKuznetsov-DD)
* :bulb: Support adding W3C baggage as span tags (#9169 - @rachelyangdog)
* :sparkles::zap: Align our default classloader excludes with OTel (#9161 - @mcculls)
* :sparkles: Backpropagate container tags hash coming from the info endpoint (#9156 - @amarziali)
* :bug: Avoid race conditions and multiple agent discovery feature states (#9135 - @amarziali)

# Instrumentations

## AWS SDK instrumentation

* :sparkles: Enhance Service Representation for Serverless (#9203 - @zarirhamza)

## gRPC instrumentation

* :bug: Add check to prevent injection of repeated GRPC headers (#9246 - @mhlidd)

## JDBC instrumentation

* :bug: Fix duplicate trace injection for SQL Server and Oracle DBM full propagation mode (#9224 - @lu-zhengda)

## Play Framework instrumentation

* :bug: Fix AppSec play.mvc.StatusHeader instrumentation for play 2.6 (#9160 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
